Package bpm.gateway.core

Interface Summary
DataStream A useful interface to manipulate object thar need Server and a deifntion like DataBase stream
ISCD A convenient Interface de design a SCD Transformation Regarless of its ype (I, II)
IServerConnection interface for all Server Connection
ITargetableStream Interface that should be implemented by transformation that will have a Target Table
Server This interface is the main interface to define InputDataStream/OutputDataStream providers
StreamDescriptor This interface describe the metadata of stream that a Transformation will provide as output
Transformation The Transformation interface.
Trashable This transfo act as a flag to say if the Transformation can generate Trash Stream
 

Class Summary
AbstractTransformation This class is the base class for all Transformations present in a BigateawayModel
Comment This class represent a Commenyt for a Gateay Model.
DefaultStreamDescriptor  
DocumentGateway This class is the gateway Model.
GatewayDigester This class can read a xml doc and restore a GatewayDocument
GatewayObject A common class that should heritated fro almost all objects in the model
StreamElement class that represent a Field from a stream
